exercises.name: Push-up
method: Start by putting yourself in prone position on your exercise area.
Place your hands flat on the floor, level with your chest.
Keep your elbows slightly close to the side of your body, 45 degrees.
Slowly lift yourself up by pushing on the floor
After extending your elbows fully, lower yourself slowly till your chest is 4-6 inches off the floor

exercises.name: Squats
method: Start by standing up straight, hands to the side, and feet shoulder-length apart.
Slowly bend your hips and knees, keeping your feet in place
As you lower yourself, keep your back straight.
A good reminder of proper form is to keep your knees from passing your toes when you look down
When your knees are 90 degrees bent, stop and slowly go back to your original positon
